title: Kristian awl beisei rih suh
lyrics:
Kristian, awl beisei rih suh,
Hmelma zingah i la awm;
Isua thu hi theihnghilh suh,
"Invengin tawngtai zel rawh".

Nangmah tikhawlo turin,
Ramhuai zawng zawng an in rawn;
I ven loh lai an nghak
"Invengin tawngtai zel rawh."

Pathian hriamhrei pek che kha,
Chhun leh zan vawngtlat langin;
Setana'n a chang a che,
"Invengin tawwngtai zel rawh."

Hnehtu thi zawng zawngte chuan,
I chetzia a rawn thlir thin;
Thu khat vuain an au thin,
"In vengin tawngtai zel rawh."

Lal pawhin fuih tur chein,
I hnenah a sawi bawk thin;
Ka thu hi hre reng ang che,
"In vengin tawngtai zel rawh."

In veng la, i hneh phawt ang,
Tawngtai la, Pathian pawhin,
Nangmah a tanpui zel ang,
"Invengin tawngtai zel rawh."
